description: RoleBinding references a role, but does not contain it. It can reference a Role in the same namespace or a ClusterRole in the global namespace. It adds who information via `subjects` and namespace information by which namespace it exists in. RoleBindings in a given namespace only have effect in that namespace.

apiVersion.description: The version of the schema for the object representation

kind.description: A string value representing the REST resource

roleRef.description: Reference a Role in the current namespace or a ClusterRole in the global namespace. If the `roleRef` cannot be resolved, the authorizer must return an error.

subjects.description: References to the objects the role applies to.
